text: @Mike_Pence Come on man. Are sure you care about the sanctity of life? Trump and you sir have  mishandled COVID-19 so badly we now have 140,000 dead. You put children in cages and separated from their parents. You are trying  to take away health insurance from those in need. #VoteOutTrump
